title: A grocery bill gut punch
itunes:title: A grocery bill gut punch
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: The August consumer price index shows that the cost of food at home was up 13.5% over the same period last year. That’s the largest annual increase since 1979, and higher energy prices, drought and the war in Ukraine all factor in. Also on today’s show: mortgage boycotts in China, stagnant household income in the U.S. and the tech that’s replacing business cards.
